json.name: Tripp Lite Rackmount Battery Pack Enclosure / DC Cabling for select UPS Systems - UPS battery

time_to_stock.raw_value: In stock with a CDW partner. Ships within 3-5 days.

json.description: BP48V24-2U rack/tower external battery pack offers extended battery runtime when used in conjunction with expandable 48V Tripp Lite rackmount and tower UPS systems. Includes heavy gauge cabling with high current DC connector for safe, simple installation. Included mounting accessories support 2U rackmount installation in 4 post racks. Options for 2-point front-rail mounting, 2 post center-mounting, wallmount and upright tower installation available. Compatible with these UPS Systems - SM2200RMDVTAA, SM2200RMXL2UTAA, SMART1500CRMXL, SMART2200CRMXL, SMART2200RMXL2U, SMART2200RMXL2UP, SMART2200RMXLN, SMART2200VSXL, SMART2600RM2U, SMART3000CRMXL, SMART3000RM2U, SMART3000RM2UN, SMART3000RMXL2U, SMART3000RMXLN, SMART3000VS, SMART5000RT3U, SMART5000XFMRXL, SMARTINT3000VS, SMX2200XLRT2U, SMX3000XLRT2UA, SMX5000XLRT3U, SU1500RTXL2UA, SU1500RTXLCD2U, SU1500XL, SU1500XLCD, SU2200RTXL2UA, SU2200RTXLCD2U, SU2200XLA, SU2200XLCD, SUINT1500RTXL2UA, SUINT2200RTXL2UA and other Tripp Lite UPS systems that specify the use of this battery pack.
json.description_html:
BP48V24-2U rack/tower external battery pack offers extended battery runtime when used in conjunction with expandable 48V Tripp Lite rackmount and tower UPS systems. Includes heavy gauge cabling with high current DC connector for safe, simple installation. Included mounting accessories support 2U rackmount installation in 4 post racks. Options for 2-point front-rail mounting, 2 post center-mounting, wallmount and upright tower installation available.

Compatible with these UPS Systems - SM2200RMDVTAA, SM2200RMXL2UTAA, SMART1500CRMXL, SMART2200CRMXL, SMART2200RMXL2U, SMART2200RMXL2UP, SMART2200RMXLN, SMART2200VSXL, SMART2600RM2U, SMART3000CRMXL, SMART3000RM2U, SMART3000RM2UN, SMART3000RMXL2U, SMART3000RMXLN, SMART3000VS, SMART5000RT3U, SMART5000XFMRXL, SMARTINT3000VS, SMX2200XLRT2U, SMX3000XLRT2UA, SMX5000XLRT3U, SU1500RTXL2UA, SU1500RTXLCD2U, SU1500XL, SU1500XLCD, SU2200RTXL2UA, SU2200RTXLCD2U, SU2200XLA, SU2200XLCD, SUINT1500RTXL2UA, SUINT2200RTXL2UA and other Tripp Lite UPS systems that specify the use of this battery pack.

Compatible with SM2200RMDVTAA/ SM2200RMXL2UTAA/ SMART1500CRMXL/ SMART2200CRMXL/ SMART2200RMXL2U/ SMART2200RMXL2UP/ SMART2200RMXLN/ SMART2200VSXL/ SMART2600RM2U/ SMART3000CRMXL/ SMART3000RM2U/ SMART3000RM2UN/ SMART3000RMXL2U/ SMART3000RMXLN/ SMART5000RT3U/ SMART5000XFMRXL/ SMX2200XLRT2U/ SMX3000XLRT2UA/ SMX5000XLRT3U/ SU1500RTXL2UA/ SU1500RTXLCD2U/ SU2200RTXL2UA/ SU2200RTXLCD2U and other UPS systems that specify the use of this battery pack
